summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Carplog-pro carp fishing tracking app. Backend API and frontend UI are fully functional with excellent integration.

minor_fixes_applied.issue: Returned status code 200 instead of 201 for resource creation
minor_fixes_applied.status: FIXED - Added status_code=201 to FastAPI decorator

passed_tests: API root endpoint (GET /api/)
Get all catches (GET /api/catches)
Get catches with year/month filters
Create new catch (POST /api/catches)
Delete catch (DELETE /api/catches/{id})
Monthly statistics (GET /api/stats/monthly)
Yearly statistics (GET /api/stats/yearly)
Error handling (404 for non-existent catch, 422 for invalid data)
Dashboard displays current month and year statistics
Add catch form accepts all fields and submits successfully
New catch appears in catches list after creation
All catches page displays catches with correct details
Statistics page shows yearly summary and monthly breakdown
Year selector in statistics page works correctly
Delete catch functionality removes catch from database and UI
Navigation between all tabs works correctly
Photo upload field is present and functional
Form validation works (required fields)
Statistics calculations are accurate
UI redirects to catches page after successful form submission
